**Example 1: 修改DSPA评估风险项**



Input: 

```
tccli dsgc ModifyDSPAAssessmentRisk --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --DspaId dspa-9xxxbacd \
    --TaskId task-mdfxxxe4 \
    --RiskId risk-yxxxmtyy \
    --Status processing
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "9a9f5c32-95ab-4130-ae37-047cde38b943"
    }
}
```
